content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

The sweetest way to say ‘I love you!’

 

For a touch of romance at home, we propose that you order our pink gift box with two festive pink heart-shaped desserts made of delicious raspberries, tonka, mascarpone and velvet ruby chocolate, and surprise your loved one with the most romantic gesture on Valentine’s Day.

 

The gift box with two festive pink heart-shaped desserts costs HRK 180 and quantities are limited.

 

The gift box can be pre-ordered at:
E. gourmet@esplanade.hr
T. +385 91 604 22 57
The order must be confirmed at least an hour before picking it up at Le Bistro.
The offer is valid until Valentine’s Day, 14 February 2022.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
